title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15ยง 4.1 - Use in road test area
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15ยง 4.1 - Use in road test area

State Regulations

No person holding a learner's permit shall operate or drive
a motor vehicle in any area designated by the commissioner as a road test area
except for the purpose of taking a road test. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15ยง
4.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
